Detailed Description

Helper class to load resource references in the background.

It loads the list of resources specified by resourceIDs and stores the resulting refs in the passed in resourceRefs. When finished it calls the callback func.

Member Function Documentation

void BGResourceRefsLoader::doBackgroundTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [virtual]

This method is called by the Background Task Manager from the background thread.

Here we can load items and do blocking i/o without interrupting the rendering thread.

Parameters:
mgr The background task manager.

Implements BackgroundTask.

void BGResourceRefsLoader::doMainThreadTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [virtual]

This method is called by the Background Task Manager from the main thread.

Here we can finish up our loading operation and call back to the rendering thread. Here we call our python callback function, as python should only be used in the rendering thread.

Parameters:
mgr The background task manager.

Reimplemented from BackgroundTask.
